sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_til_post"> <x_0586_til_post action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category display_value="Note">83f60c3e1b8154908ed631d7dc4bcbaa</category> <github_id>20</github_id> <github_url>https://github.com/iamkalai/SNTIL/issues/20</github_url> <message>The state of updateset while being committed can be misleading sometimes. This is due to updates being applied using Progress workers and the state being updated via UI action.  FYI - https://hi.service-now.com/kb_view.do?sysparm_article=KB0622557</message> <number>TIL0001013</number> <status>old</status> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-05-16 15:53:06</sys_created_on> <sys_id>2b249b791b3894108ed631d7dc4bcb3a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-06-03 05:52:37</sys_updated_on> <title>Misleading Updateset State</title> </x_0586_til_post> </record_update>
